summary: An Ordinance approving the amended assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1461, for the improvement of Northlake Avenue, from Fourteenth Avenue Northeast to Fifteenth Avenue Northeast, and Fifteenth Avenue Northeast, from Northlake Avenue to Brintnall Place, by constructing sewers therein of proper dimensions and material, together with the necessary wyes, openings, manholes, lampholes, catch basins, flush tanks and other appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 15764 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, declaring the same to be a first lien thereon, and providing for the collection of said assessment.
